PrecisAppointment of ERNST & YOUNG LLP of Ottawa, Ontario, as auditor of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2010; and appointment of the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as joint auditor of Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation for the year 2010.
